channel.title: Andre Meyer on Andre Meyer - Electronic Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Andre Meyer on Andre Meyer - Electronic Engineer

item.title: Adaino
item.description: I am a core developer of Adaino, an open source Analog Data Acquisition library for Arduino. It simplifies reading analog inputs at any sampling rate and cares about the proper acquisition thereof.

item.title: Electronics
item.description: Reliable electronic components build the basis for innovative products.

item.title: FPGA
item.description: In applications where energy efficiency, data throughput, or fast response times are important, FPGAs (Field Programmable Gate Arrays) play a key role.

item.title: Sensors
item.description: Sensors enable digital devices to perceive their environment.

item.title: Embedded Systems
item.description: The optimal interaction of hardware and software enables the development of outstanding devices.

item.title: Signal Processing
item.description: Reliable embedded devices require robust and high-performance signal processing.

item.title: Smart Machine Vision Camera
item.description: Intelligent cameras not only record images, but also process them to recognize important image information themselves.

item.title: Communication Systems
item.description: Todays digital systems are connected to the Internet and regularly exchange data.

item.title: X-Ray Detector
item.description: Using X-ray sensors, images can be taken from inside a person or object without opening it.

item.title: Software
item.description: Software skills help an electronic engineer solve his problems quicker.

item.title: Speaker Processor
item.description: The digital speaker processor is a versatile system-on-chip design optimized for digital audio processing in modern technology gadgets.

item.title: Radiation Physics
item.description: In the development of X-ray detectors, the simulation of radiation physics provides crucial inputs for their improvement.

item.title: About
item.description: As an electronic engineer applying the latest technologies and design methods, I love to develop new, groundbreaking and astonishing solutions satisfying both, technical and economical needs. The usability of the products stands beside their reliability and producibility in the first place.
